Key Match Events: Dillon Brooks was assessed a technical foul for hanging on the rim 28 seconds into the game.
Post-Match Reflections: The Rockets maintained their No. 2 spot in the Western Conference standings.
The Rockets' defense, led by Dillon Brooks, set the tone for the game.
The Rockets' head coach Ime Udoka emphasized the team's toughness and grit.
The Rockets are considering adding help at the trade deadline to make a deep postseason run.
